resources.string: Flashlight LED Torch light
Enjoy the bright torch and flash light with various modes and features right at your finger tips.
" Experience the fun of multiple colour flash light that'll transform any space into a colourful dance floor. Get started now!"
You can find out more information by clicking on the following link :
We do not share any kind of your Personal Data with third parties.
Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time for any reason. We will notify you of any changes to our Privacy Policy by posting the new Privacy Policy here.
Any type of modification to the app or its components is not allowed.
If we find the app is being used outside its terms of use, we may restrict access to it.
By pressing the Accept button, I declare I have read and accepted the following condition of use.
The application is notifying you to the presence of an app that provides several services that are essential information for safer and more efficient use.
Terms of Use
Hello blank fragment
How to remove this application from the restricted list of power saving features on the phone?
Why this app not flashing or not flashing sometimes?
How to avoid accidentally closing this app?
What permissions does this app require?

1. This application was accidentally 
2. On some phones, the phone's battery optimizer did not allow the app to run in the background, causing this app to stop working. 
3. When the phone indicators low battery level and you activate the power saving feature, this application may stop working. 
4. When you shutdown and restart your phone, on some devices this app may not be able to restart itself. 
5. In any case, when this application is closed and not working, you just need to reopen this application.
Locking this app on the multitasking manager can make this app work better, keep it active all the time, avoid this app being closed accidentally (disabled and inoperable).

Call management: Enable this permission, when you having incoming calls, we can flash to notify you Notifications: Enable this permission so that we can notify battery status Background running: Enable this permission to keep the flash of incoming call and battery detection working stably Notification Access: Enable this permission so that we can flash when you receive messages from other applications Display Permission: Enable this permission so that we can show notifications appear on the top of screen Camera Access: Enable this permission so that flashlight can work normally.
Turn On For Incoming Calls
Turn On For SMS
Turn On Notifications

Off
